channel.title: Makeing staff
channel.description:
makeing staff is easy as 1...2...3... 1.get on your server by logging on... 2.logg back out for it too work.. 3.go on your server files and look for *characters* 4.look for the username you have logged into from... 5.double click the name until a notepad... 6.now on that notepad go to *find) and type (character rights) 7.the zero right beside it delet that and make it one of these numbers...
0=player 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner/co-owner
this is what it is supposed to look like...
[ACCOUNT] character-username = example character-password = example
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3219 character-posy = 3219 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 0 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = NOT SHOWING MY INFO character-lastlogin = 20090727 character-energy = 39 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 39
NOW ON CHARACTER RIGHTS TYPE OVER THAT ZERO...PUT 1 2 OR 3
after you have placed the number you want save the notepad and logg back in and their you go you now know how to make staff.... :)

item.title: Makeing staff
item.dc:creator: @codex2009 codex2009
item.description:
@codex2009 wrote:

makeing staff is easy as 1…2…3…
1.get on your server by logging on…
2.logg back out for it too work…
3.go on your server files and look for characters
4.look for the username you have logged into from…
5.double click the name until a notepad…
6.now on that notepad go to *find) and type (character rights)
7.the zero right beside it delet that and make it one of these numbers…

0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner/co-owner

this is what it is supposed to look like…

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = example
character-password = example

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3219
character-posy = 3219
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = NOT SHOWING MY INFO
character-lastlogin = 20090727
character-energy = 39
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 39

NOW ON CHARACTER RIGHTS TYPE OVER THAT ZERO…PUT 1 2 OR 3

after you have placed the number you want save the notepad and logg back in
and their you go you now know how to make staff…

Read full topic
